name: quadrant_scan
title: Quadrant scan for high-resolution UIs
description: Split the screen into grid-labeled quadrants to inspect dense interfaces and plan clicks.

arguments.name: goal
arguments.description: What you are trying to find or click

arguments.name: output_dir
arguments.description: Optional directory for the saved quadrant images

content.text: Goal: {{goal}}. Call `screenshot_quadrants` using grid_size={{grid_size}} when provided and output_dir={{output_dir}} when provided. Return full_screenshot_path plus quadrant paths, scaling_factor/warnings, and note that grid labels are full-screen logical coordinates. Point out which quadrant likely contains the target and propose exact logical coordinates to click or hover.
